name: Farrell–Jones conjecture
rephrased: The algebraic K-theory and L-theory of a group's ring can be calculated by studying its virtually cyclic subgroups.
implication_form: If the assembly map associated with the virtually cyclic subgroups is an isomorphism, then the algebraic K-theory and L-theory of the group ring can be computed from the K- and L-theory of its virtually cyclic subgroups.
posed_by: Jonathan Rosenberg and Michael Weiss (often credited as a collaboration with Wilhelm Lück)
